title: Stage Lv9-P2-S08
description: Level 9 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: If the company had invested in R&D earlier, it would be the market leader now.
If we had hired more staff last year, we wouldn't be so busy today.
learning_points: Level 9 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 회사가 예전에 R&D에 투자했다면, 지금 시장 리더가 되었을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If the company had invested in R&D earlier, it would be the market leader now.

sentences.kr: 작년에 직원을 더 고용했다면, 지금 이렇게 바쁘지 않았을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If we had hired more staff last year, we wouldn't be so busy today.

sentences.kr: 그들이 내 조언을 받아들였다면, 지금 성공했을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If they had taken my advice, they would be successful now.

sentences.kr: 초기에 더 신중하게 계획했다면, 지금 이런 문제들에 직면하지 않았을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If we had planned more carefully initially, we wouldn't be facing these problems now.

sentences.kr: 그때 기술에 더 투자했다면, 지금 경쟁 우위를 점하고 있을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If we had invested more in technology then, we would have a competitive advantage now.

sentences.kr: 초기에 품질 가니에 더 주의했다면, 지금 브랜드 이미지가 더 좋았을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If we had paid more attention to quality control initially, our brand image would be better now.

sentences.kr: 그때 전문가의 의견을 구했다면, 지금 이런 복잡한 상황에 있지 않았을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If we had consulted experts then, we wouldn't be in such a complicated situation now.

sentences.kr: 첫번째 기회를 놓치지 않았다면, 지금 더 안정적인 위치에 있을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If we hadn't missed the first opportunity, we would be in a more stable position now.
